member.name: T:InfoBDMysql.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Clase de recurso fuertemente tipado, para buscar cadenas traducidas, etc.

member.name: P:InfoBDMysql.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Devuelve la instancia de ResourceManager almacenada en caché utilizada por esta clase.

member.name: P:InfoBDMysql.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Reemplaza la propiedad CurrentUICulture del subproceso actual para todas las búsquedas de recursos mediante esta clase de recurso fuertemente tipado.

member.name: T:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator
member.summary: Animates a form when it is shown, hidden or closed.
member.remarks: MDI child forms do not support the Blend method and only support other methods while being displayed for the first time and when closing.

member.name: T:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationMethod
member.summary: The methods of animation available.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Roll
member.summary: Rolls out from edge when showing and into edge when hiding.
member.remarks: This is the default animation method and requires a direction.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Centre
member.summary: Expands out from centre when showing and collapses into centre when hiding.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Slide
member.summary: Slides out from edge when showing and slides into edge when hiding.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Blend
member.summary: Fades from transaprent to opaque when showing and from opaque to transparent when hiding.

member.name: T:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationDirection
member.summary: The directions in which the Roll and Slide animations can be shown.
member.remarks: Horizontal and vertical directions can be combined to create diagonal animations.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Right
member.summary: From left to right.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Left
member.summary: From right to left.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Down
member.summary: From top to bottom.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Up
member.summary: From bottom to top.

members.member: Gets or sets the direction in which the animation is performed. The direction in which the animation is performed. The direction is only applicable to the Roll and Slide methods.
Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which the animation is played. The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played.
Gets the form to be animated. The form to be animated.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.AnimateWindow(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Windows API function to animate a window.

members.member: Creates a new FormAnimator object for the specified form. The form to be animated. No animation will be used unless the Method and/or Direction properties are set independently. The Duration is set to quarter of a second by default.

Creates a new FormAnimator object for the specified form using the specified method over the specified duration. The form to be animated. The animation method used to show and hide the form. The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played. No animation will be used for the Roll or Slide methods unless the Direction property is set independently.

Creates a new FormAnimator object for the specified form using the specified method in the specified direction over the specified duration. The form to be animated. The animation method used to show and hide the form. name="direction"> The direction in which to animate the form. name="duration"> The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played. The direction argument will have no effect if the Centre or Blend method is

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.Form_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Animates the form automatically when it is loaded.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.Form_VisibleChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Animates the form automatically when it is shown or hidden.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ModFormAnimator.Form_Closing(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs)
member.summary: Animates the form automatically when it closes.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.openForms
member.summary: The list of currently open ToastForms.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.allowFocus
member.summary: Indicates whether the form can receive focus or not.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.animator
member.summary: The object that creates the sliding animation.

member.name: F:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.currentForegroundWindow
member.summary: The handle of the window that currently has focus.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.GetForegroundWindow
member.summary: Gets the handle of the window that currently has focus.
member.returns: The handle of the window that currently has focus.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.SetForegroundWindow(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Activates the specified window.
member.param: The handle of the window to be focused.
member.returns: True if the window was focused; False otherwise.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new ToastForm object that is displayed for the specified length of time.
member.param: The length of time, in milliseconds, that the form will be displayed.

member.name: M:InfoBDMysql.ToastForm.Show
member.summary: Displays the form.
member.remarks: Required to allow the form to determine the current foreground window before being displayed.
